bibl.title: Sky, Sex and Sun. The Meanings of aﬁdo›ow / aﬁdo›on in the Derveni Papyrus. Translated by Michael CHASE. <aidoios / aidoion>
bibl.note: 1. The version of the Orphic theogony commented in the Derveni papyrus. - 2. The cosmological interpretation of the Orphic theogony. - 3. Objections and answers.
BRISSON Luc, Sky, Sex and Sun. The Meanings of aﬁdo›ow / aﬁdo›on in the Derveni Papyrus. Translated by Michael CHASE. <aidoios / aidoion>
